name: The Lost Hat
description:
The Lost Hat

Can you find Vincent's hat? It is keeping him awake at night. He can't sleep without it.

A game inspired by the paintings of Vincent van Gogh. Featuing; "The Starry Night".

Created for "Paint Jam 2019".

Illustrated by only using the default MS Paint colour palette.

Artwork by Lewis Fox.

https://www.instagram.com/lewis0fox/

Made in Twine, powered by Harlowe.

a From the Chasm production, 2019.
